content:
As the saying goes:
"To do good work, one must have good tools."
With those shellfish tongs in your hands, you must be—

content:
Ah...
So that's why it tastes like seafood - it's the shellfish tongs!

content: *sniff sniff* Something smells fishy! Could this be what they mentioned in "The Hard Guide to Umami"—

content: Let's settle this with the lobster!

content: "A craftsman is only as good as his tools," and judging by your shellfish tongs, you must be quite the expert at going toe-to-toe with lobsters!

content:
When the chance comes,
you must face me, the heir of the Lobster Fist style—
Let's see who's stronger!
